price: (18) No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in ʿilliyyūn.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
